Pi noticed how strong the scent of food was becoming. It filled her and made her ravenous, and soon, she began to feel faint from hunger. She refused to eat the food, and something strange began to happen.

Pi began blowing up, like a balloon. Her arms became flabby and jiggled with every movement. Her thighs bulged until they pressed together. Her stomach grew bigger and bigger, until she looked like she might burst. Her butt grew too, and she felt the milky cheeks stretching the fabric of her clothing tighter and tighter as she expanded. Finally, her breasts became the size of cantalopes, shaking sensually with every movement and bursting through her clothes.

She stared at her own body, confused and slightly pleased with her new look. She was so big, she could only waddle instead of move...

She decides...

14.title: Alkaid

an odd looking remote lying on the ground that said increase and decrease on it.
141.content: As Alkaid was strolling through a city she caught her eye on a poster. :Sumo wrestling contest applications due in 2 weeks. All are allowed to participate. Grand prize is 10,000,000 G One rule though, all participants must be atleast 900lbs.: "900lbs?!and 10,000,000 G?!" Alkaid said in shock "Who could even get that big let alone wrestle at that size?!" As she walked along thinking of a way to make herself gain a lot of weight in time for the contest. She spotted something that could help her gain, it was...
141.title: She saw a Poster of  sumo wrester tournament

1412.content:
A tree full of glowing fruit!

Alkaid had left town and decided to walk around a field for a while trying to come up with a way to get her up to the needed size. Nothing had come to mind until she had spotted a particular tree just standing there it's leaves swaying in the virtual wind.

Of course that was normal, those glowing almost orange-sized fruit however were not even by The World standards.

"Eh?"

Strolling over to the tree Alkaid was thankful it wasn't too tall. She hated to admit but she was a bit on the small side compared to other PC's. Shoving that thought aside she tapped one of the fruit with the blunt portion of her twin blade.

No gas, no bright flash, no sudden explosion just continuous shinning.

Was it safe? She wasn't really sure but decided to press her luck as she plucked it off the branch with a simple swipe.

Circular like an orange yet hard as an apple, strange mix but it looked okay nonetheless. Shrugging Alkaid gave it a simple bite.

Unknown to her the effects were almost instant.
1412.title: a tree full of glowing fruit

choices: Leave these fruits here for other players, I'll find something else to help me.
14123.content:
(lets say at the beginng of this story Alkaid is 100lbs for conveinence)

"Wh-What the hell?!" Alkaid shouted as she suddenly shot up to 250lbs in weight. How could one bite from a fruit do this?!" she said as Alkaid took a look at her new body. Alkaid notcied that she now had several love handles and rolls all around her body, mostly on her hips, thighs, and belly. She put her hand to her face and found that it was now rather plump and puffy. She drew her hand downward and felt a new doulbe chin now accompanied her first one. She gave a big slap to her much larger belly and watched as it jiggled for a few seconds. "Amazing." Alkaid said. I didn't know The World was capable of this kind of character modifaction in such a compact form" she said as she looked at the odd fruit she had just bitten out of. Alkaid then continued with herself as she then decided to look at her butt. She noticed that it was now far larger than it was before each cheek now the same size as her butt was at it's original size, effectively doubling it in size.

"Well all I know is now I'm one step closer to entering that sumo tournament." Alkaid said in confidence. "I gues now I should...
14123.title: Alkaid gains around 150 pounds

choices: Alkaid eats only one more fruit putting her at exactly 1,000 pounds!
Alkaid eats the seven remaining fruits and ends up weighting 3,700 pounds!!!
141231.content:
Eat more of these fruits, obviously!"

Anyone near and dear to the redhead knew she was fiercely competitive (much like her crush Haseo was) but at the same time Alkaid wasn't fond of cheaters...then again perhaps C.C. Corp had purposely "planted" this tree due to the upcoming tournament so it wasn't exactly cheating if that was the case and it wasn't as if she was going to use a fruit during the actual competition so...

Looking downward at the sparkling fruit in her hand Alkaid snickered softly.

She bit away at the fruit once more before finishing it off with a third attempt.

The outcome didn't take long in fact before she could blink an eye Alkaid felt as if she had expanded well over 400 pounds, her attire stretching and straining (but due to being in the virtual world would not snap), but that was just a sample before bloating up to 550!

At little past a quarter ton Alkaid surprisingly felt amazing. Her body had expanded greatly, a foot or two large belly hanging near her knees, thick hearty thunder thighs, massive fat-filled arms, door-sized hips and a heck of a shelf for a butt, even her already big breasts blew up by multiple cups though still behind her immense belly.

Outside of her physical changes she also noticed her stats had taken a huge hit upward. Everything had seemingly risen like a rocket heading to the cloud, most notably was her massive HP jump and how incredibly high her attack and defense had risen.

Was it possible that she be able to beat Haseo easily with this new strength, even if he himself had game-breaking strength, Alkaid didn't have an answer but she was loving her new "form" now then before.

She realized though she was still short of the goal of 900 pounds but being the well-educated girl she was she came to the conclusion one more fruit (which gave her a combined total of 450 pounds) would be enough to push her right about the target mark.

Of course Alkaid being a former Arena Empress wanted to win, wanted to prove her skill and dominance over all others that stood in her way to the top and obviously the only way to do that would be to have even more of those delicious fattening fruits. After all the minimum was only 900...
141231.title: Eat more of these fruits!

choices: Alkaid decides to refill and use the remote now
Alkaid tries gaining another way, only using the remote if truly needed
Before Alkaid can come to a decision she runs into someone
1413.content:
"900 pounds minimum...geez no small feat." Alkaid chuckled at her accidental pun. Normally she should have let the contest slide but like her close friend (and crush) Haseo the redhead had a competitive streak a mile long. So in the end the former Arena Empress was determined to be the victor even if it meant getting close to half a ton. A part of her though was happy only her in-game avatar was gaining and not Chika herself.

In any case as she continued walking through the battle city, Lumina Cloth, Alkaid came to spot a strange looking item almost thrown away at a corner of the street. Eyebrow raised and rather curious Alkaid scanned around for anyone perhaps looking for it.

No seem to be interested as all the PC's continued on their merry way.

"Hmm"

Casually strolling over to the spot of the object Alkaid quickly popped it into her hands.

She looked it over a few times. The shape appeared to be that of a remote, strange indeed she thought.

Increase and decrease it said with a flipping switch in between the two.

"What the hell?" she wondered.

Currently the switch was flipped over to decrease, curious Alkaid spied on a huge beast warrior easily two maybe three times larger then many of the other PC's. Smirking she pushed the button and was surprised to see the beast man begin to shrink slightly in size!

Wide-eyed Alkaid walked away casually yet as steadily she could so as not to bring any attention to herself and what had just occurred. As she did so she was surprised to see red light shine above the word increase.

Upon closer inspection there something of a meter made up of five dots, four of which were unlit.

Curious yet again Alkaid flipped the switch to increase and blindly pushed the trigger...

She was surprised to see a female PC unknowingly increase in size, and by "size" it meant in fat! It was almost as if the previous warrior's muscle girth was shifted and transferred as fat into another character.

Again Alkaid made herself scarce while eying the remote in her hands.

In truth she hated cheaters, having accused Endrance and Haseo as such, and yet here her mind was begging her to use the remote.

Two weeks really wasn't a lot of time to get big enough and train herself to move at such a size or perhaps getting a helping hand wasn't so bad. Plus Endrance and Haseo had used their Avatar power during an Arena battle Alkaid however only wanted to use it help her training not during the actual competition.
1413.title: A remote to success?

choices: A mountain of vanilla ice cream appears between the two girls.
A large bowl of ice cream appears in front of each girl.
15531221.content: Rena looked at the calender of events eagerly. She scrolled through the list. "Ugh! same old stuff. Find this. Save that." She scrolled down to a section of the list that was recently added. "Wait! I've never seen these before." Rena looked at the new additions. Many of them seemed to be various expansion or growth based missions. "I guess these are for those who are into stuff like this." She spots a mission that has just opened up. "Hmmmm. Eat all the ice cream. I can do that easy." Rena clicks on the mission peraminters. "Huh. It says i need a partner. I send an email out. I'll bet Ouka would love a mission like this. She's always going on about how much she loves ice cream." Rena sends an email to her shapeshifting friend telling her to meet up on the sigma server. 10 minutes later Rena spots the scantily clad werewolf as Ouka jogs up to the gate. "Hi Rena! What's this about an ice cream eating mission?" "All it said was that we had to eat all the ice cream." Rena says with a shrug. "Between us we can do it easy." Ouka says confindantly. They enter the words to the area and gate there. While in the gating process the screen inverts as static crackles over the audio several times. When Rena lands in the area she looks at Ouka confused. Ouka gives a shrug. "I've never had that happen before. The adminstrators must have been trying to do final uploads to the area as we were gating in." They look around. The field is a large prarie with several trees and patches of flowers. Off in the distance they see a pair of chairs. "I'll beat you there Rena!" She takes off at full speed to the chairs. "Oh no you don't! Rena cries as she takes off after the werewolf. When they get to the chairs their stomachs rumble ominously and hungrily. "Was that our stomachs?" Rena asks. Ouka's belly rumbles again even louder this time. She rubs it. "I guess so, Maybe they are trying out a new program on us. You know, to increase the experience of playing The World." They sit on the chairs. Just as they were starting to wonder where the ice cream was.....
15531221.title: ouka

choices: She's the same, but even hungrier.
155312211.content: A portal appears between the girls, which promptly opens, and reveals a large mountain of ice cream. "It looks like we have a challenge ahead of us." Says Ouka with a smile. Both girls start gluttonously devouring the vanilla ice cream with empty, rumbling, belllies. As they eat, their bellies stretch and bloat as the mountain shrinks. Both girls collapse onto the chairs after finishing the ice cream. "OOOFFFHHH! So full!" Moans Rena as she massages her massively swollen belly. "I have never eat so much in my life." Ouka groans as she struggles to her feet. A chime sounds as a potion appears in front of each girl. "Apparently if we drink these potions, our stomachs will return to normal." Rena says as she scans a email. Both girls gulp down the potions. A few seconds later, loud gurgling and sloshing eminate from the girls' midsections as their bellies shrink. After a few minutes, the noises stop. Ouka looks herself over and notices that....

1553122111.content: Her formerly toned middle now sports a thick layer of soft flab, her hips and thighs have grown 6 inches, and her boobs have grown 3 sizes. Her top barely cover her nipples and the bottom is barely visible through her plumpened figure. She gasps then rubs a hand over her gut and the other over her very round rear. "This actually isn't so bad." Ouka thinks to herself as she starts rubbing her belly with both hands. She looks up at her friend. Rena has grown even larger then her shapeshifting friend. Her belly juts out from her formerly slim figure about a foot, her hips and thighs about 10 inches, her rear is quite round, and her boobs are now big CCC's. "Ouka! You too?" She asks shocked. "Yep." Ouka says with a pat on her belly. "What are we gonna do?" Rena says as she grabs two handfuls of her chocolate belly shakes it, making it jiggle violently. She stares at the quaking mound of flesh as if hypnotized. "Actually, I don't think this is so bad Rena." Ouka says as she walks over to her fat little friend. She reaches out and rubs the top of Rena's soft gut. "Think about it. Doing nothing but eating, gaining more weight, and being lazy." Rena looks up into Ouka's eyes. "Really Ouka? You want to get even fatter?" Ouka nods. "Yes." Rena smiles, reaches over, and rubs Ouka's pudgy belly. "Okay Ouka. I'll gain weight with you!" A chime sounds. Ouka reads the email this time. "Huh. It says we can do the mission over again." Rena opens her mouth and says:

-Pick any your favorite .hack// girl from .hack// series.

-Female sumo wrester is allowed only.
